full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 FAR EAST PLACEMENT AGENCY 300 WEST COAST HIGHWAY NEWPORT BEACH, CALIF. 92660 LOS ANGELES, CALIF.: 3511 WEST SIXTH STREET PHONE (714) 642-8703 SAN FRANCISCO, CALIF.: 821 MARKET STREET INV June 12, 1968 Dept. of Justice Naturalization and Immigration Service 300 N. Los Angeles Street Los Angeles, Calif. Dear Sirs, One of our alien immigrants has not received her identification card and has asked me to write you to request that you send it to her as soon as possible. She entered the U. S. on January 17, 1968, arriving from Taiwan, Rep. of China by B.O.A.C. Betty Mao #8 Lane 95, Shui Yuan Street Taipei, Taiwan, Rep. of China Her employers at that time were: Mr. and Mrs. Erle Halliburton I.15/ 4507 Perham Rd. Corona Del Mar, Calif. 92625 Her present employers and present address: Dr. and Mrs. Renato Monaco new waddread Newport Beach, Calif. 92660/ 1243 Santiago Drive Phone 714-548-4447 Will you please advise us if there is anything else we can do to expedite this matter? Thank you. Very truly yours, Ruin Admin A17-181-791 D.D (Mrs.) Ruth Schuh 2-6-68 HONG KONG TAIPEI MANILA LONDON GLASGOW MANCHESTER BOURNEMOUTH
